name: NO REST FOR THE WRECKED
description:
GAMEPLAY:

Download the knowledge from the buried wrecks of the elders, resting in the spooky graveyard. Doing so will restart the said bots and they won't be happy about it. They will hurt you. Repair yourself by downloading more and more and more. It will heal you, make you faster and will make you stronger.

WSAD/Arrowkeys  . . . . . . move

Mouse1/E . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . knowledge download

Space . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .dash

[Due to time restrictions of the jam, the game hasn't reached it's full potential and I will upload an update once the judgments has been served by the jam organizers]

Made by beerdmaan for Backtrace game jam in 56 hours.

Reach me at beerdmaan@gmail.com
